verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w departed|strong="G5563"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Athens|strong="G0116"\w*, and \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w*, \w born|strong="G1085"\w* in \w Pontus|strong="G4193"\w*, \w lately|strong="G4373"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Italy|strong="G2482"\w*, \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w*; (because \w that|strong="G1223"\w* \w Claudius|strong="G2804"\w* had \w commanded|strong="G1299"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* to \w depart|strong="G5563"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w*:) and \w came|strong="G4334"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w because|strong="G1511"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* of the same \w craft|strong="G3673"\w*, he \w abode|strong="G3306"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wrought|strong="G2038"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* by their \w occupation|strong="G5078"\w* they were \w tentmakers|strong="G4635"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w reasoned|strong="G1256"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* \w Silas|strong="G4609"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* were \w come|strong="G2718"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* was \w pressed|strong="G4912"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, and \w testified|strong="G1263"\w* to the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \add that\add* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \add was\add* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w opposed|strong="G0498"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="G0987"\w*, he \w shook|strong="G1621"\w* \add his\add* \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Your|strong="G5216"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \add be\add* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* your \w own|strong="G5216"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*; \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \add am\add* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w*: \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w henceforth|strong="G3568"\w* I will \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w departed|strong="G3327"\w* \w thence|strong="G1564"\w*, and \w entered|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \add man’s\add* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Justus|strong="G2459"\w*, \add one\add* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4576"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3588"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* joined hard \w to|strong="G4927"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Crispus|strong="G2921"\w*, the chief ruler of the \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w*, \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* on the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* of the \w Corinthians|strong="G2881"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* to \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*, \wj  \+w Be|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w afraid|strong="G5399"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w speak|strong="G2980"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w hold|strong="G4623"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w thy peace|strong="G4623"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1360"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4675"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w shall set|strong="G2007"\+w* \+w on thee|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w to hurt|strong="G2559"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4571"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1360"\+w* \+w I|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w much|strong="G4183"\+w* \+w people|strong="G2992"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w city|strong="G4172"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w continued|strong="G2523"\w* \add there\add* a \w year|strong="G1763"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*, \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Gallio|strong="G1058"\w* was the \w deputy|strong="G0445"\w* of \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*, the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* made \w insurrection|strong="G2721"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* against \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the judgment \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \add fellow\add* \w persuadeth|strong="G0374"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* to \w worship|strong="G4576"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* contrary \w to|strong="G3844"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* was now \w about|strong="G3195"\w* to \w open|strong="G0455"\w* \add his\add* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w Gallio|strong="G1058"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w If|strong="G1487"\w* it \w were|strong="G2258"\w* a \w matter|strong="G5100"\w* of \w wrong|strong="G0092"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w* \w lewdness|strong="G4467"\w*, \w O|strong="G5599"\w* \add ye\add* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w reason|strong="G3056"\w* would \w that|strong="G2596"\w* I should \w bear|strong="G0430"\w* with \w you|strong="G5216"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* it \w be|strong="G2076"\w* a \w question|strong="G2213"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w names|strong="G3686"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add of\add* \w your|strong="G5209"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, look \w ye|strong="G3700"\w* \add to it\add*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1014"\w* \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w judge|strong="G2923"\w* of \w such|strong="G5130"\w* \add matters\add*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w drave|strong="G0556"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the judgment \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w took|strong="G1949"\w* \w Sosthenes|strong="G4988"\w*, the chief ruler of the \w synagogue|strong="G0752"\w*, and \w beat|strong="G5180"\w* \add him\add* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* the judgment \w seat|strong="G0968"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gallio|strong="G1058"\w* cared \w for|strong="G3199"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of those \w things|strong="G5130"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \add after this\add* \w tarried|strong="G4357"\w* \add there\add* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* a \w good|strong="G2425"\w* \w while|strong="G2250"\w*, and then took his \w leave|strong="G0657"\w* of the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, and sailed \w thence|strong="G1602"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Syria|strong="G4947"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w*; having \w shorn|strong="G2751"\w* \add his\add* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cenchrea|strong="G2747"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w vow|strong="G2171"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w came|strong="G2658"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w and|strong="G2548"\w* left \w them|strong="G2641"\w* \w there|strong="G0847"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1525"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, and \w reasoned|strong="G1256"\w* with the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w desired|strong="G2065"\w* \add him\add* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w tarry|strong="G3306"\w* \w longer|strong="G4119"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w consented|strong="G1962"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w bade|strong="G0657"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w farewell|strong="G0657"\w*, \w saying|strong="G2036"\w*, \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* by all \w means|strong="G3843"\w* \w keep|strong="G4160"\w* this \w feast|strong="G1859"\w* that \w cometh|strong="G2064"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* I will \w return|strong="G0344"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w if|strong="G2309"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w sailed|strong="G0321"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w landed|strong="G2718"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*, and gone \w up|strong="G0305"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saluted|strong="G0782"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, he went \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Antioch|strong="G0490"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* after he had \w spent|strong="G4160"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \add there\add*, he \w departed|strong="G1831"\w*, and went \w over|strong="G1330"\w* \add all\add* the \w country|strong="G5561"\w* of \w Galatia|strong="G1054"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Phrygia|strong="G5435"\w* in \w order|strong="G2517"\w*, \w strengthening|strong="G1991"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Apollos|strong="G0625"\w*, \w born|strong="G1085"\w* at \w Alexandria|strong="G0221"\w*, an \w eloquent|strong="G3052"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \add and\add* \w mighty|strong="G1415"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w*, \w came|strong="G2658"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*.

This \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w instructed|strong="G2727"\w* in the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* being \w fervent|strong="G2204"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, he \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w diligently|strong="G0199"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1987"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* the \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to speak \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*: \w whom|strong="G0846"\w* \w when|strong="G0191"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Priscilla|strong="G4252"\w* had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, they \w took|strong="G4355"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w unto|strong="G4355"\w* \add them\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w expounded|strong="G1620"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* more \w perfectly|strong="G0199"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was \w disposed|strong="G1014"\w* to \w pass|strong="G1330"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*, the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w*, \w exhorting|strong="G4389"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* to \w receive|strong="G0588"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w who|strong="G3739"\w*, when he was \w come|strong="G3854"\w*, helped \w them|strong="G4820"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* had \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w mightily|strong="G2159"\w* \w convinced|strong="G1246"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \add and that\add* \w publickly|strong="G1219"\w*, \w shewing|strong="G1925"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w scriptures|strong="G1124"\w* \w that|strong="G1925"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1511"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
